briefdescription.para: Number of times the Dirac operator was applied.

simplesect.para: unsigned long int Number of applications of the Dirac operator to the full lattice

briefdescription.para: nnumber of times the single precision Dirac operator was applied.

simplesect.para: unsigned long in Number of applications of the single precision Dirac operator to the full lattice

briefdescription.para: Massless Dirac operator. This will run on the GPU when compiled WITH_GPU, otherwise these correspond to calling the standard CPU version.

parameterdescription.para: Output spinor field that the operator will be applied to
Input spinor field before Dirac operator operation

briefdescription.para: Dirac operator. This will run on the GPU when compiled WITH_GPU, otherwise these correspond to calling the standard CPU version.

parameterdescription.para: Output spinor field that the operator will be applied to
Input spinor field before Dirac operator operation
